scripts.pack:dev: cd layers/main/nodejs && npm install && cd ../../migrations/nodejs && npm install && ../../.. && aws --region $npm_config_aws_dev_region cloudformation package --template-file dist/main.yaml --s3-bucket $npm_config_aws_dev_bucket --output-template-file dist/dev.yaml
scripts.init:stack:dev: aws --region $npm_config_aws_dev_region cloudformation deploy --template-file dist/dev.yaml --stack-name $npm_config_aws_dev_stack --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --parameter-overrides SendGridKey=$npm_config_aws_dev_sendgrid MailFromEmail=$npm_config_aws_dev_from_email MailFromName=$npm_config_aws_dev_from_name GoogleOauthClientId=$npm_config_aws_dev_google_client_id Domain=$npm_config_aws_dev_domain DBProxyKeyPair=$npm_config_aws_dev_dbssh DBUser=$npm_config_aws_dev_dbuser DBName=$npm_config_aws_dev_dbname DBPassword=$npm_config_aws_dev_dbpassword DataS3BucketName=$npm_config_aws_dev_databucket StageName=dev PassSalt=$npm_config_aws_dev_password_salt
scripts.update:stack:dev: aws --region $npm_config_aws_dev_region cloudformation deploy --template-file dist/dev.yaml --stack-name $npm_config_aws_dev_stack --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --parameter-overrides "DeployVersion=$(date +'%s')"
scripts.init:dev: npm run yaml && npm run pack:dev && npm run init:stack:dev
scripts.update:dev: npm run yaml && npm run pack:dev && npm run update:stack:dev
